Class Handler

java.lang.Object
handler.Handler
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClearHandler, CollectionHandler, FileHandler, ListHandler, LoadHandler, LoginHandler, RecipeHandler, RegisterHandler, UserHandler

Base class for all the WebAPI handlers
